fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
FDF works closely with FoodDrinkEurope on our priority areas: 
 
-EU Exit 
-Competitiveness 
-Diet and Health 
-Food Safety and Science 
-Sustainability  
  
As part of our engagement at EU level, we hold meetings with the European Commission, MEPs and the UK Government to ensure policies are effective and proportionate.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
FDF is a member of the following Brussels-based trade associations (all signed up to the Transparency Register): 
 
* FoodDrinkEurope (FDE)FDE's mission is to represent the food and drink industries’ interests, at the level of both European and International institutions. 
 
* Euroglace (the European ice Cream Association) 
 
* Clitravi (Liaison Center for the Meat Processing Industry in the European Union) 
 
*AIPCE-CEP (the European Fish Processors Association)
relevant_communication:
FDF is very active within FoodDrinkEurope and we support FDE lobbying activity.  
 
We also host our own events and meetings to engage MEPs and policymakers.
goals__remit:
The Food and Drink Federation (FDF) is the voice of the UK's food and drink industry, the largest manufacturing sector in the country. 
 
FDF's membership comprises manufacturers of all sizes, as well as trade associations and groups dealing with specific sectors of the industry.
